description: n8n Credentials Template for Nura Neural - Replace placeholders before import

credentials.name: Nura PostgreSQL
credentials.notes: Get user/password from Azure Key Vault: postgres-admin-password

credentials.name: Azure OpenAI
credentials.notes: Get API key from Azure Key Vault: openai-api-key. Base URL must include /openai/deployments for Azure.

credentials.name: Azure AI Search
credentials.notes: Get API key from Azure Key Vault: nura-search-api-key

credentials.name: Miniflux API
credentials.notes: Generate API key from Miniflux UI: Settings > API Keys > Create

credentials.name: Nura Redis
credentials.notes: Internal Container Apps networking - no password required

credentials.name: Azure Blob Storage
credentials.notes: Get connection string from Azure Portal: Storage Account > Access Keys

placeholders.{{POSTGRES_PASSWORD}}: PostgreSQL admin password from Key Vault
placeholders.{{AZURE_OPENAI_KEY}}: Azure OpenAI API key from Key Vault
placeholders.{{AZURE_SEARCH_KEY}}: Azure AI Search admin key from Key Vault
placeholders.{{MINIFLUX_API_KEY}}: API key generated in Miniflux settings
